charges.charge_description: Ct 2: Possession with intent to distribute a quantity less than 50 kilograms, that is 35 kilos of marihuana; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D) &; 18 USC 2; Offense Date: 03/10/98 Penalty: MAXIMUM 5 yrs and/or $250,000 plus 2 yrs SRT as to each count; (2)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 12 months &; 1 day; SRT 3 years without supervision if deported and conditioned on no unlawful return into the U.S. Special Assessment: $100.00 (2)
